venue.name: Center for the Arts (CFA) Theater, Wesleyan University

item.description:
Not a movie, but many of us just enjoy getting together for a good, free concert too! Let's put another thing in the calendar

Music for Three: Bold Works for Piano, Violin & Cello
Saturday, October 11, 8pm
Crowell Concert Hall
Free admission


A program of adventurous works for piano trio featuring Private Lessons Instructor Erika Schroth, piano, with Adrian Slywotzky, violin and Miriam Eckelhoefer, cello. Works will include the rock-inspired "Nivea Hair Care Styling Mousse" by Dutch composer Jacob TV, the "Spring" trio of Astor Piazzolla and a world premiere of a trio by Neely Bruce.
Music for Three: Bold Works for Piano, Violin & Cello

Maybe we can go for dinner/pizza and/or drinks afterwards, somewhere along Main St...We'll leave that option open
item.how_to_find_us: I'll stand by the entrance...You can call my cell phone, 860-710-0300
item.name: Music for Three: Bold Works for Piano, Violin & Cello
